name: Fantasy Draft Lottery
description:
Determine the draft order for your fantasy sports leagues -- football, baseball, basketball, hockey, soccer and more! Create your leagues, load up your teams and run a draft lottery. With Fantasy Draft Lottery, you can:

- Create draft orders for all of your leagues
- Determine draft orders for leagues with any number of teams
- Give each team an equal chance at the first pick or weight it in favor of the worst teams
- Email the draft order results directly to your league's owners
- Save completed draft lotteries and review draft order histories
- Clone previous years' drafts to save time next year

Great for all of your drafting needs -- fantasy sports, sports tournaments, xmas gift swaps, etc.
